Assay.EditorialNote: This is a proxy class to be replaced by its OBI equivalent, once there is an official release built off BFO v1.1 that can be successfully classified using Pellet v1.5.0 in Protege.
Comment: It appears in some ontologies that assay is restricted to measurement of analytes.  We use it here to include any type of measurement procedure
Assay.Definition: A planned process with the objective to produce information about the material entity that is the evaluant, by physically examining it or its proxies(Ontology of Biomedical Investigation:  obo:OBI_0000070)
